DOC.criteria: 1 . Accepted Informed Consent 2 . Study subject male , age 18 50 year ; 3 . Research subject body mass index great equal 19 less equal 30 ; 4 . Subjects consider healthy , base analysis clinical history clinical laboratory data . 1 . Having donate lose 450 mL blood 6 month precede study ; 2 .
